explanation: [0-0] It's an animated scene. On a pixelated city street, Sonic and Shadow stand on a red and blue track, ready to start a race. Rows of tall buildings line both sides and the end of the road.

[0-5] A giant red dice falls from the sky and lands on the track, determining how many steps they will take forward. The dice rolls a few times and displays a number, and Shadow moves forward by that number of steps. The dice falls again, this time turning blue, and stops, and Sonic also moves forward by the corresponding number of steps.
